description: The Visitation; Juan Carreño de Miranda (Spanish, 1614 - 1685); about 1655 - 1660; Pen and brown ink and gray-brown wash, heightened with white gouache, over touches of black chalk on light brown paper (recto); Black chalk (verso); 24.8 x 23.7 cm (9 3/4 x 9 5/16 in.); 94.GA.91; J.
